mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET order_status = 'DELIVER' WHERE email = #{email} AND order_status = 'ORDER' AND NOW() >= CASE WHEN TIME(created_at) < '14:00:00' THEN DATE_ADD(DATE(created_at), INTERVAL 14 HOUR) ELSE DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(DATE(created_at), INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 14 HOUR) END
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(o.order_id) AS order_id, o.email, o.address, o.postcode, SUM(o.total_price) AS total_price, MIN(o.created_at) AS created_at, #{orderStatus} AS order_status FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.email = u.email WHERE o.email = #{email} AND o.order_status = #{orderStatus} AND u.deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY o.email, o.address, o.postcode ORDER BY order_id desc;
